scripts.save: git add . && git push origin -m "chore: init" && git push origin
scripts.resetDB_d: npx sequelize db:drop && npx sequelize db:create && npx sequelize db:migrate && npx sequelize db:seed:all
scripts.resetDB_t: npx sequelize db:drop --env test && npx sequelize db:create --env test && npx sequelize db:migrate --env test && npx sequelize db:seed:all --env test
